import React from 'react' import { Input } from '../../components' import { ROUTE_PATHS } from '../../shared/constants/route-paths' import { userAuthFormLiterals } from '../../shared/constants/literals' const UserAuthForm = ({ type }) => { return (

{ type === ROUTE_PATHS.SIGN_IN ? userAuthFormLiterals.WELCOME_BACK['en'] : userAuthFormLiterals.JOIN_US_TODAY['en'] }

{ type !== ROUTE_PATHS.SIGN_IN && ( ) }
) } export default UserAuthForm
